problem_text: For trapezoid Q R S T, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If Q R = 16, P M = 12, and T S = 4 x, find x.
compact_text: For trapezoid QRST, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If QR = 16, PM = 12, and TS = 4x, find x.
annotat_text: For trapezoid QRST, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If QR = 16, PM = 12, and TS = 4x, find x.
